attributes.action: Support a change in the current law that will allow for the transfer and continuity of Tax Free Savings Status from a deceased persons I.S.A. account to that of a surviving spouse.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Are you aware that
1: All Tax Free Savings Investment Accounts are currently deemed closed on the date of the investors death.

This petition suggest a simple change in this rule to allow for the transfer of funds from a deceased persons held I.S.A. account to that of a spouse.Thus allowing the Spouse to continue to retain the previously held tax free  status on the new account.

 
In submitting this petition I am requesting both Public and Prime Ministerial support for the introduction of a new and important, "I.S.A.Bereavement Tax Free Transfer Account.

"IT MAKES SENSE".
